name: Primus Campfire Tongs
description: Minimalist tongs for remote grilling adventures and precision grippin' and flippin'. Cut-outs provide a secure grip even when wet or greasy, and the length is just enough to keep your hands out of the heat.Durable stainless steel construction.Cut-outs provide a reliable gripping surface.Compact length for easy storage and packing.Serrated, tapered ends add control and precision for delicate asparagus or feisty bratwurst.
